This study help researcher determine lack expression antimicrobial peptide individual AD play role susceptibility eczema vaccinatum ( EV ) .
DOC.brief_title: Analysis Response Subjects With Atopic Dermatitis Psoriasis Oral Vitamin D3
DOC.detailed_description: Atopic Dermatitis ( AD ) chronic inflammatory skin disorder skin become extremely itchy susceptible recurrent skin infection . AD think occur combination immunological , genetic , environmental factor . Individuals AD risk develop severe widely disseminate infection call eczema vaccinatum ( EV ) . EV cause live attenuate vaccinia virus vaccine reproduce spread throughout body . Individuals AD lack certain antimicrobial peptide , specifically cathelicidins . This trial also include sub-study individual psoriasis . Psoriasis also immune-mediated skin disease , characterize scale skin inflammation ( pain , swell , heat , redness ) . Most psoriasis cause patch thick , red skin silvery scale . These patch itch feel sore . This sub-study provide additional information psoriatic response oral vitamin D. ( Originally list separately ADVN-CATH-03-01 , NCT : 01078259ID . )
